formalMetadata.description: A text that requires a reading ability above the upper secondary education level, without a summary or other supplement that may help people with certain cognitive disabilities to understand the text, and without an alternate version that is easy to read.

purpose.p: This test case is intended to fail because there is no summary or other supplement to help the reader understand the text, nor an alternate version that is easy to read. Only the reading level is tested here, not the other aspects of the document (descriptive section titles, expanded forms for abbreviations, etcetera).

expertGuidance.p: Check whether there is a summary or other supplement to help the reader understand the text, or an alternate version that is easy to read.

functionalOutcome.p: There is no supplement that helps readers with a reading level that is not higher than lower secondary education level.

techComment.p: This test case does not map to a WCAG 2.0 technique or failure.
